advisory.name: RLBA-2021:4255
advisory.synopsis: copy-jdk-configs bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for copy-jdk-configs is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation EnterpriseLinux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: copy-jdk-configs script uses find and xargs but RPM does not depend on them
